bibl.title: Notes on the Genuineness of the Constantinian Documents in Eusebius' Life of Constantine. Appendix by T.C. Skeat.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Journal of Ecclesiastical History 5 (1954) pp. 196-200. - P. Lond. III, 878 descr. (= S.B. VI, 9217-9218) confirms the authenticity of one of the Constantinian edicts cited by Eusebius. The papyrus is a contemporary copy of the Letter of A.D. 324. - Pp. 261-262: Appendix by T.C.S.: Palaeographical note; - Note on the restoration of the text.
